programme.desc: The wise-cracking blue hedgehog, made famous by a series of popular video games on Sega consoles, continues his computer-animated adventures through the Shatterverse. programme.title: Liar: The Fake Grooming Scandal
programme.desc: An investigation into the false allegations of rape, grooming and trafficking made by Ellie Williams in 2020 and the backlash faced by police and Asian people in Barrow-in-Furness after her arrest. When the 22-year-olds post detailing the sexual and physical assaults she claimed to have suffered at the hands of an Asian grooming gang went viral, thousands demanded action, but were shocked to hear Ellie herself had been arrested - prompting attacks on local Asian-owned businesses and demonstrations in other northern cities

programme.title: Jerk
programme.desc: Tim lands himself a role as an extra in a period biopic about a famous disabled musician. When some campaigners kick up a fuss about the star lead - James Norton - not being disabled, Tim is recast as the lead in a knee-jerk reaction to avoid media backlash. The bosses are so concerned with optics surrounding disability, they completely disregard the authenticity of the film - Tim doesnt even have the right disability and aside from that, cannot act to save his life. Chaos therefore ensues as he brings the production to its knees. Tim Renkow stars in this comedy a cerebral palsy sufferer who uses his condition to get away with saying what others are unable to

programme.title: Son of a Critch
programme.desc: A bittersweet coming-of-age comedy set in 1980s Newfoundland based on Canadian comedian and actor Mark Critchs memoir of the same title. The pint-sized hero is 11-year-old Mark, who grows up in St Johns with his radio reporter father Mike, mother Mary, older brother Mike Jr and grandfather Patrick. Mark nervously prepares to enter junior high school and he makes a new best friend, Ritche Perez.

programme.title: Kayak o Thuaidh
programme.desc: Novice kayakers Tessa Fleming and Irial Ó Ceallaigh nervously prepare to take on one of Irelands most daunting and precarious sea crossings. A short passage to the inner islands off the coast of Machaire Rabhartaigh looks easy compared to the unrelenting, rolling waves to Tory island. They find out about the Gaelic culture of the island and following a disrupted sleep and another treacherous Atlantic crossing they are relieved to arrive back on the mainland. In Irish

programme.title: Na Feilte Tine
programme.desc: In the second part of the series that explores the four indigenous Irish festivals - Samhain, Imbolg, Bealtaine and Lúnasa - the focus is on Imbolg - St Brigids Day. Celebrated on the first of February, Imbolg originated as a Celtic fertility festival but now signals the beginning of spring and an end to the darkness of winter

programme.title: The Traitors Ireland Uncloaked
programme.desc: Host Kevin McGahern, along with celebrity guests and players from the show, assess the latest betrayals, mind games and manipulations

programme.title: Life and Death Row
programme.desc: The documentary follows the final few weeks of the appeals process in Texas as Ramiro Gonzales desperately tries to have his execution overturned, while the family of his victims seek justice. In 2006, Ramiro Gonzales received the death penalty for kidnapping, raping and murdering a former classmate, 18-year-old Bridget Townsend, but in his appeals process, his supporters argue that the human brain only matures by a persons mid-twenties and he has now become a man of deep religious faith

programme.title: The Traitors Ireland Uncloaked

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden purchases two dilapidated apartments nestled in the sun-kissed hills of rural Sicily, intending to raise them from their ruins and create luxury holiday homes. The hope is that she and workmate friend Alan Carr to make a huge profit they can donate to charity. After arriving at the crumbling property for the first time, the piles of rubbish and abandoned junk suggest to both that that this visit will be no holiday

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden and Alan Carr take on their first project - designing a Sicilian kitchen. Kicking off the demolition in 36-degree heat proves to be a trial for Alan, and he soon realises that taking on a build in a medieval hilltop town comes with its own unique challenges. With the help of Project Manager Scott, Amanda barters with the locals at a nearby marble factory as she bags a bargain for their feature island and brushes up on her culinary skills in Marsala, learning how to cook Sicilys signature dish

programme.title: First Dates Hotel
programme.desc: Six-foot gym owner and ex-military man Richard is paired with Emilia. Despite his muscular appearance, he is a sensitive soul who loves musicals and Harry Potter, and his Aspergers leaves him unable to read what others are thinking, so mid-date he is forced to ask Emilia how he is doing. Meanwhile, 40-year-old hotelier Andy arrives at Vesuvius for his first ever date with a man, 37-year-old bouncer Joseph, and police officer Angie hooks up with car salesman Tom, who is determined to leave his stereotypical lad image behind

programme.title: Songs of Ireland
programme.desc: Pat Shortt and Mike Hanrahan conclude their journey around Ireland. The duo start in the town of Keady in Armagh, where they perform Four Green Fields with Ciara ONeill. Pat and Mike move on to County Down to perform The Star of the County Down with singer-songwriter Sarah McCreedy. In Belfasts County Antrim, they meet Winnie Ama and come up with a fresh take on Ill Tell Me Ma

programme.title: Home Rescue: The Big Fix
programme.desc: Dee Coleman and Peter Finn come to the aid of Ger and Josephine Nihill, who live In the rural heartland of Tulla in County Clare with son Johnny and daughter Bridget. Josephine is a full-time carer for both her husband and daughter but the house is full of clutter, from curtains, clothes and chairs to more than a dozen mattresses. Can the team turn things around in time for eldest daughter Marys wedding?

programme.desc: Nucky heads for the Republican Party convention in Chicago, where he tries to influence plans for the presidential election - and crosses paths with Jimmy once more. Back in New Jersey, Eli is eager to prove he can step into his brothers shoes, while Van Alden struggles to deal with his wifes problems, Gillian tries to offer Angela financial advice, and an alcohol-fuelled Lucy causes a scene at the Ritz - forcing Margaret to intervene. Prohibition-era drama, starring Steve Buscemi and Michael Pitt

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: Christina questions the nature of her reality, while Charlotte gives William the task of tracking down a human outlier who has breached

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: Caleb uncovers a disturbing truth as he attempts to escape from Charlottes interrogation and Bernard and C make their way to the resistance hideout

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Sansa frets about her prospects, Tyrions new situation agitates Shae, and Tywin counsels the king. Daenerys exchanges gifts with a slave lord outside Yunkai, Melisandre reveals a secret to Robert Baratheons illegitimate son Gendry, and Brienne faces a formidable foe at Harrenhal. Emilia Clarke and Peter Dinklage star in an episode written by George RR Martin, whose novels form the basis for the series

programme.title: Das Boot
programme.desc: Klaus procures information for American admiral Kenton, while Schulz reports to Koch to be sure of Klauss implication in the navy coup. In German

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky gets an unexpected opportunity for revenge on his would-be assassins, and enlists Chalky to help bring them down. Masked sniper Richard Harrow struggles to fit in at his new lodgings, while Margaret is delighted when a law is passed giving women the right to vote - unaware that the good news has made her an increasingly important part of Nuckys plans. Meanwhile, a dressing-down from Elliott causes Val Aldens behaviour to become increasingly erratic. Drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Kelly Macdonald and Michael Kenneth Williams

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Jimmy returns to Atlantic City, having decided to work with Nucky again - but is determined to do it on his own terms. However, he is surprised to learn that neither his boss nor Angela had been expecting him. Meanwhile, an under-pressure Mme Jeunet begs Margaret to persuade Nucky to lower her rates, Rothstein welcomes a new face into the fold, and Robert Dittrich raises Angelas hopes of getting her big break in the art world. Drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Michael Pitt and Kelly Macdonald

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: An old enemy is released from prison and sets about taking revenge on Frank by frustrating a current investigation and terrorising his wife. Police drama, starring Daniel Baldwin, Ned Beatty and Andre Braugher

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Part one of two. Pembleton and Bayliss investigate the discovery of a body at an arson scene. Gritty police drama, starring Kyle Secor and Andre Braugher

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Daenerys and her entourage discover Yunkais powerful friends are the Second Sons, an elite army of mercenaries. Determined to take the city and increase the strength of her own forces, the queen agrees to meet the sellsword companys captains - intending to make them a better offer. Meanwhile, Davos is still desperate to make Stannis see clearly and demands to see proof of Melisandres power. There is a wedding in Kings Landing, and beyond the Wall, Sam and Gilly have a chilling encounter with a foe that seems to have come straight from their nightmares. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke and Liam Cunningham

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robb and his bannermen gather at the Twins in the northern Riverlands to attend the wedding of Lord Edmure Tully and Roslin Frey, daughter of Lord Walder. Elsewhere, Jon faces his harshest test to date, Daario and Ser Jorah debate how to take Yunkai, and Bran discovers a new gift. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire novels, starring Richard Madden, Michelle Fairley and David Bradley

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Genny is forced to put a plan into action with an endless number of risky outcomes, which could result in him losing everything. In Italian

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: In the final episode of the series, Ciro, Genny and Enzo agree a treaty with the Confederati, obtaining part of their territories. In Italian

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tonys generosity in giving up his time with Dr Melfi pays off - but his feud with Ralph reaches breaking point. Meanwhile, Meadow and Jackie Jnr find they have more in common than they thought. Crime drama, starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Herc and Carver arrest a driver after witnessing him picking up a large amount of cash from known gang members, but are forced to return the money when the mans political connections to a senator are revealed. After his apartment is raided and van torched, Omar takes revenge in a street encounter with Wee-Bey and Stinkum

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: Sledges division is sent to assist the attack on a fortified position in Okinawa. As they struggle through the muddy landscape, they encounter horrific evidence of the conflicts impact on Japanese civilians, and struggle to reconcile their duties with the suffering of the regions people. Second World War drama, starring Joseph Mazzello

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Sansa frets about her prospects, Tyrions new situation agitates Shae, and Tywin counsels the king. Daenerys exchanges gifts with a slave lord outside Yunkai, Melisandre reveals a secret to Robert Baratheons illegitimate son Gendry, and Brienne faces a formidable foe at Harrenhal. Emilia Clarke and Peter Dinklage star in an episode written by George RR Martin, whose novels form the basis for the series

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: August arrives and the fishermen of Brixham spend time ashore with their families as their boats are repaired - but summer proves costly for Jan, who loses £1,000 for every day his vessel is out of action. Apprentice deckhand Logan has to decide whether a life at sea is the right choice for him and his family, and seafood seller Jenny receives a surprise on her 65th birthday

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Paul meets Tammy for coffee after giving evidence in his malpractice case, but quickly loses his temper. Later, he visits Gina for his next session of therapy, and wonders whether he treats his patients like a surrogate family - but is angered when she brings up the topic of his dying father. Drama, with Gabriel Byrne, Dianne Wiest and Laila Robins

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Documentary following stately home owners who hire out their estates to earn extra income, and the clients who pay to use their properties for functions including stag parties, weddings and hunting trips. The programme explores how the reality of life in Britains grand houses is often less glamorous than it appears, as proprietors struggle to maintain crumbling buildings and pay utility bills, and examines the modern-day divide between domestic staff and their employers. Featuring life at Chillingham Castle, Maunsel House, Carlton Towers and Muncaster Castle

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: After a storm wrecks their home, a speedy sloth called Laura and her eccentric family move to the big city in their rusted food truck in the hope of making their business a success. Animated adventure, with the voices of Leslie Jones and Remy Hii

programme.title: The Rugrats Movie
programme.desc: Tommy tries to return his new brother to the baby shop, helped by Angelica, Chuckie, Phil and Lil - but the friends become lost in dense woodlands en route, turning their expedition into a scary and exciting journey of discovery. Animated comedy based on the TV series, with the voices of Elizabeth Daily, Christine Cavanaugh, Kath Soucie, Whoopi Goldberg and Busta Rhymes

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: A leaky boat leaves the precocious youngsters stranded on a jungle island, but their luck changes when explorers the Wild Thornberrys come to their rescue. However, Thornberry dad Nigel loses his memory, so it falls to his daughter Eliza to save the day. Childrens animated adventure, with the voices of Nancy Cartwright, Bruce Willis, Lacey Chabert, Elizabeth Daily and Tim Curry

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A gang of streetwise penguins decides to escape from New Yorks Central Park Zoo and return to a life in the wild, but when Marty the zebra and his friends follow suit, they end up stranded in Africa on a jungle island without a clue about how to fend for themselves. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The escaped zoo animals discover a plane and, following a swift repair job by the penguins, manage to escape the desolate shores of Madagascar. However, they crash-land on the plains of Africa and find themselves face-to-face with their wild counterparts for the first time. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer and Jada Pinkett Smith

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sends Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty on a quest into the Forbidden Forest, leading to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history. Animated adventure, with the voices of Demi Lovato, Julia Roberts, Rainn Wilson and Joe Manganiello

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: A pet chameleon with an active imagination ends up lost in the desert. He makes his way to a lawless town of animals, where he is mistaken for a deadly gunslinger and made sheriff. He organises the townsfolk into a posse when bandits led by an evil rattlesnake steal their supply of water. Oscar-winning animated comedy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: A hero is needed to defend a peaceful valley community from attack by a rampaging snow leopard. The unlikely candidate for the job is a lazy panda, who enlists the aid of a legendary team of animal fighters and their wise master to teach him the martial arts skills he needs to fulfil his destiny. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman, Angelina Jolie, Ian McShane and Jackie Chan

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: Years before the sentient robots became arch enemies, Optimus Prime and Megatron were friends on their home planet of Cybertron. However, their feud changes the universe forever. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Chris Hemsworth, Brian Tyree Henry, Scarlett Johansson and Keegan-Michael Key

programme.title: The Inseparables
programme.desc: A puppet and an abandoned stuffed animal toy cross paths in Central Park and pair up for an epic adventure in New York City. Animated adventure, with the voices of Monica Young and Danny Fehsenfeld

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris
programme.desc: The lucky little tots embark on a trip to a French theme park - but while the rest of the gang are intent on enjoying themselves, Chuckie is distracted by his wish for a new mum. He sets his sights on the owner of the amusement park as a prospective partner for his single dad. Animated adventure, with the voices of Christine Cavanaugh, Elizabeth Daily, Cheryl Chase, Kath Soucie and Susan Sarandon

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: After a storm wrecks their home, a speedy sloth called Laura and her eccentric family move to the big city in their rusted food truck in the hope of making their business a success. Animated adventure, with the voices of Leslie Jones and Remy Hii

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Young Angelo dreams of becoming an explorer and a zoologist. When he goes to visit his granny, his parents leave him behind at a rest stop, and he decides to cut through the forest in search of them. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Kristen McGuire

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: A fox and a hare embark on a journey to find their missing owl friend. Animated adventure, with the voices of Teresa Gallagher, Dan Skinner and Sarah Madigan

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lacey Chabert, Tim Curry, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Lynn Redgrave and Jodi Carlisle

programme.title: Bon Voyage, Charlie Brown (and Dont Come Back!)
programme.desc: Animated adventure as Charlie Brown, Snoopy and the rest of the Peanuts gang visit England and France on an exchange trip - but the perpetually worried youngster is concerned by a mysterious letter. With the voices of Arrin Skelley, Laura Planting, Daniel Anderson and Casey Carlson

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: An alien on the run from his own people arrives on Earth and embarks on an adventure with a daring young woman. It turns out to be a life-changing trip during which they begin to understand the true meaning of the word home. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin and Jennifer Lopez

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Martial arts master panda Po continues to hone his skills when an evil peacock, who was banished from China for trying to build a deadly new weapon, returns to cause more chaos. It falls to Po to defeat him, but he suffers strange flashbacks revealing a connection between his past and the sinister bird. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black and Gary Oldman

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A tribe of perpetually happy fuzzy-headed creatures are kidnapped by a race of giants who intend to eat them. The princess of the clan escapes and plans a rescue mission - but to save her friends, she will need the help of a grumpy troll with a loathing of music who has rejected their joyful culture to live as a loner. Animated musical, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: Boog, Elliot and their pals team up to track down an elusive werewolf and prevent their forest from being intruded upon by hunter Shaw. Animation, with the voice of Will Townsend and Donny Lucas

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight and his allies pursue four supervillains who have joined forces to cause havoc on Halloween. They discover the gang is working for the Joker, who has a grander scheme in mind - unleashing a computer virus that will make every piece of technology in Gotham City obey his commands. Animated adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Troy Baker

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: The feuding duo wind up in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a villain. They also try to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber. Animated adventure, with the voices of George Ackles and Sean Burgos

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: A leaky boat leaves the precocious youngsters stranded on a jungle island, but their luck changes when explorers the Wild Thornberrys come to their rescue. However, Thornberry dad Nigel loses his memory, so it falls to his daughter Eliza to save the day. Childrens animated adventure, with the voices of Nancy Cartwright, Bruce Willis, Lacey Chabert, Elizabeth Daily and Tim Curry

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: Jackie Chans The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A bumbling chauffeur steps in to take the place of a secret agent injured in an explosion. Wearing the agents hi-tech suit, and with the help of a rookie spy, the humble driver now has all the power he needs to stop a villain from gaining global domination by polluting the worlds water supply. Comedy adventure, starring Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs and Richie Coster

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two teenage friends are on the brink of going to different colleges, so decide to mark the event by going to a party where they hope to lose their virginity. However, they have promised to supply the booze for the event, a task that proves much harder than expected because they are under age. Unfortunately, when a friend steps in to help, the situation gets even worse. Comedy, starring Jonah Hill, Michael Cera and Christopher Mintz-Plasse

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack, a struggling musician, gets hit by a bus during a mysterious event. When he regains consciousness, he finds that he is the only person who can remember the Beatles, and sets out to exploit the opportunity by passing their hits off as his own compositions. Danny Boyles comedy, starring Himesh Patel and Lily James

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: More than a decade on from his appearance in documentary series The Office, a film crew is once again following the life of David Brent. He is now working as a rep for a cleaning-goods distributor, but harbours dreams of making it big in the music business. Acting on this, he takes three weeks off work and tours with a new-look version of Foregone Conclusion, the band he fronted in the 1990s. Mockumentary comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Ben Bailey Smith and Tom Basden.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A journalist desperate to be posted to a war zone encounters a special forces agent, who claims to have been part of a top-secret project to endow soldiers with superhuman powers. As the reporter joins the supposed psychic on a journey across Iraq, he discovers the bizarre story behind the experiment. Satirical comedy, starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: An ordinary man has a vision that the end of the world is coming. A series of inexplicable natural disasters confirms that the apocalypse is indeed at hand, and he leads a band of misfits on a perilous journey across their city in search of the means to save Earth. Spoof comedy, starring Matt Lanter and Vanessa Minnillo

programme.title: The Cinema List: SNL
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, the Cinema List explores 50 years of films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dim-witted friends Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When Harry discovers he has a daughter he never knew about, he breaks his friend out of a psychiatric hospital and they go on a road trip with the intention of fulfilling parental responsibilities neither of them is capable of. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: A directionless bassist meets the girl of his dreams, but finds that romancing her comes with a dangerous catch. She has seven evil ex-lovers, all endowed with tremendous fighting skills or superpowers - and before he can go out with her, he is expected to face each one in a battle to the death. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: Divorced couple Jane and Jake are reunited at their sons college graduation after 10 years apart, and end up sleeping together. Despite Jakes marriage to a younger woman and Janes fledgling romance with a kindly architect, the pair end up having a clandestine affair. Romantic comedy, starring Meryl Streep, Alec Baldwin and Steve Martin

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
programme.desc: Young agent Juni has to go it alone when his big sister Carmen is kidnapped by the evil Toymaker, forcing the plucky junior spy to infiltrate the villains virtual reality world to rescue her. Adventure sequel, starring Daryl Sabara, Alexa Vega, Sylvester Stallone, Antonio Banderas, Ricardo Montalban, George Clooney, Steve Buscemi, Salma Hayek and Elijah Wood

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Young courting couples Fred and Wilma, and Barney and Betty are invited to stay at a luxury casino in the Stone Age gambling capital. Owner Chip Rockefeller is bent on stopping Fred proposing to wealthy Wilma, because he wants to marry her himself for the money and settle his debts. Family comedy prequel, with Mark Addy, Stephen Baldwin, Joan Collins, Alan Cumming, Kristen Johnston and Jane Krakowski

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: In modern-day London, Oliver Twist is a talented graffiti artist who is lured into a street gang headed by Fagin. Before long, he and his hustlers plan the heist of the century. Director Martin Owens update to Charles Dickens Oliver Twist, starring Michael Caine, Lena Headey, Noel Clarke, and Sally Collett, who also wrote the screenplay

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A childrens football team competes in a world championship, but one member is left off the field to look after the canine mascot. When an evil plot emerges to sabotage the tournament, the quick-witted dog assembles the other mascots into a team to foil the villains responsible. Family adventure, starring Matthew James Roberts and Kristin Carey, with the voice of Rob Schneider

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent becomes Britains leading spy following the assassination of all the countrys other espionage experts. Single-handedly he sets out to unmask a mysterious villain responsible for stealing the Crown Jewels - but no one is prepared to believe a sinister billionaire is the culprit. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia and Ben Miller

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent retires to a Tibetan monastery in disgrace after a mission goes wrong. He is lured out of seclusion by the chance to redeem himself when his former bosses seek his help in foiling an attempt to assassinate the premier of China. Spy comedy sequel, starring Rowan Atkinson, Gillian Anderson, Rosamund Pike and Dominic West

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: An orphaned girl befriends a benevolent giant, who takes her off to a magical land, where they attempt to stop the man-eating creatures that are invading the human world. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure based on Roald Dahls book, starring Mark Rylance, Ruby Barnhill and Penelope Wilton

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: The adventures of the boy who never grows old, as he whisks Wendy Darling and her brothers away to the magical world of Neverland - where they come face to face with fearsome Captain Hook. Adaptation of JM Barries fantasy novel, starring Jeremy Sumpter, Rachel Hurd-Wood, Jason Isaacs and Lynn Redgrave

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: Two Second World War evacuees face a dilemma when they meet a German pilot who has been shot down. Family drama, starring John Bardon and Stacey Tendeter

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A 14-year-old with a reputation for tall tales loses the sole copy of a story he has written for school - only for it to end up in the hands of a Hollywood producer. When the youngster realises it has been made into a blockbuster movie, he goes to Los Angeles with his best friend to claim a fair share of the profits - but when the movie executive refuses to do the right thing, they plan a fitting revenge. Comedy, with Frankie Muniz, Paul Giamatti and Amanda Bynes

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creatures mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tigers Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. Drama, starring Sunny Pawar, Claudia Gerini and Amandeep Singh

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freyas army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravennas wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A 14-year-old with a reputation for tall tales loses the sole copy of a story he has written for school - only for it to end up in the hands of a Hollywood producer. When the youngster realises it has been made into a blockbuster movie, he goes to Los Angeles with his best friend to claim a fair share of the profits - but when the movie executive refuses to do the right thing, they plan a fitting revenge. Comedy, with Frankie Muniz, Paul Giamatti and Amanda Bynes

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creatures mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tigers Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. Drama, starring Sunny Pawar, Claudia Gerini and Amandeep Singh

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: An orphaned girl befriends a benevolent giant, who takes her off to a magical land, where they attempt to stop the man-eating creatures that are invading the human world. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure based on Roald Dahls book, starring Mark Rylance, Ruby Barnhill and Penelope Wilton

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A private eye is recruited by a group of Buddhist mystics and sent on a mission to rescue an abducted boy whose supernatural powers will enable him to bring about world peace. However, the kidnapper is actually a demon in human form, determined to ensure the youngster does not fulfil his destiny. Comedy fantasy adventure, starring Eddie Murphy, Charles Dance and Charlotte Lewis

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: In his quest for world domination, a power-mad Persian cat plots to sabotage a scientists plans to cure all humans who are allergic to dogs. A heroic puppy joins a force of canine secret agents to foil his schemes. Comedy, starring Jeff Goldblum and Elizabeth Perkins, and featuring the voices of Tobey Maguire, Alec Baldwin, Susan Sarandon and Sean Hayes

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creatures mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tigers Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. Drama, starring Sunny Pawar, Claudia Gerini and Amandeep Singh

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: DArtagnan faces a race against time to rescue his kidnapped sweetheart, the queens seamstress and confidante Constance. The young womans survival may rest with Milady, compelling DArtagnan to forge an uneasy alliance with his former enemy. Meanwhile, King Louis XIII faces the prospect of civil war, fuelled by conspirators within his royal court. Swashbuckling sequel, starring François Civil, Eva Green and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Jackie Chans The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A bumbling chauffeur steps in to take the place of a secret agent injured in an explosion. Wearing the agents hi-tech suit, and with the help of a rookie spy, the humble driver now has all the power he needs to stop a villain from gaining global domination by polluting the worlds water supply. Comedy adventure, starring Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs and Richie Coster

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: The bumbling security guard is invited to attend a conference in Las Vegas, and brings his teenage daughter along for a family holiday before she leaves for college. However, he is forced to leap into action when he uncovers a gang of criminals are plotting a casino heist. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Raini Rodriguez

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: A mercenary is assigned a target on a flight, but when rival assassins board the plane, the hunter and the hunted are forced to team up. Action thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Katee Sackhoff and Julian Kostov

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two sexually frustrated teenagers use their computer to design the perfect woman, but are ill prepared for the outcome when their creation comes to life. She decides to make men of them, by putting them in a series of situations that will force them to stand up for themselves. John Hughes sci-fi comedy, starring Kelly LeBrock, Anthony Michael Hall, Ilan Mitchell-Smith, Robert Downey Jr and Bill Paxton

programme.title: Ferris Buellers Day Off
programme.desc: A teenager plays truant from school and spends the day dragging his girlfriend and a reluctant friend into all manner of crazy adventures in the big city - while the schools dean of students vows to stop at nothing to prove the youngster is faking illness. Comedy, starring Matthew Broderick, Mia Sara, Alan Ruck, Jennifer Grey, Jeffrey Jones and Charlie Sheen

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A veteran lifeguard commands a highly trained team that keeps the sun-kissed resort of Emerald Bay safe. As he breaks in some new recruits - including an insubordinate former Olympic swimmer - he has to contend with a dangerous new drug sweeping the beach. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario and Priyanka Chopra

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: News of a friends murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian OConner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster

Leonidas, fearless king of Sparta, leads 300 of his finest warriors into battle against the vast invading armies of the ruler of the Persian empire. As the outnumbered Spartans fight for their country, his queen, Gorgo, tries to rally support for her husband at home. Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varleys comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: After losing his home, Lucius, the son of a slain Roman General, is forced to enter the Colosseum in an attempt to bring glory back to Rome. Ridley Scotts historical drama sequel, starring Paul Mescal, Pedro Pascal and Denzel Washington, with Connie Nielsen and Derek Jacobi reprising their roles from the first film

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: An inexperienced military officer is sent to the front line in a war against an alien invasion, and dies within minutes. However, at the point of death, he is transported back in time to relive his last day again. As he faces the same battle over and over again, the experience he gains turns him into the ultimate warrior. Sci-fi adventure based on Hiroshi Sakurazakas novel All You Need Is Kill, starring Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, Baby, a young getaway driver with tinnitus, takes part in a heist which seems doomed to fail, especially as the characters involved lose touch with reality as events spiral out of control. Writer/director Edgar Wrights Bafta-winning, music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Lily James, Jamie Foxx, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: A troubled priest and a novice nun discover a religious orders terrible secret and battle a malevolent force while investigating the apparent suicide of a Romanian nun. Fifth instalment in The Conjuring Universe horror saga, starring Taissa Farmiga and Demián Bichir

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a world dominated by deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator, and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: A troubled priest and a novice nun discover a religious orders terrible secret and battle a malevolent force while investigating the apparent suicide of a Romanian nun. Fifth instalment in The Conjuring Universe horror saga, starring Taissa Farmiga and Demián Bichir

Leonidas, fearless king of Sparta, leads 300 of his finest warriors into battle against the vast invading armies of the ruler of the Persian empire. As the outnumbered Spartans fight for their country, his queen, Gorgo, tries to rally support for her husband at home. Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varleys comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: After losing his home, Lucius, the son of a slain Roman General, is forced to enter the Colosseum in an attempt to bring glory back to Rome. Ridley Scotts historical drama sequel, starring Paul Mescal, Pedro Pascal and Denzel Washington, with Connie Nielsen and Derek Jacobi reprising their roles from the first film

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-vampire possesses all the strengths inherent in bloodsuckers with none of their weaknesses, and is determined to wipe the monsters from the face of the Earth. However, he faces a deadly new threat in a renegade vampire who is close to decoding an ancient prophecy that will allow him to repopulate the world with his kind. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Stephen Dorff and Kris Kristofferson

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Scientists create a futuristic police state, but political assassinations and corruption provoke an acrobatic rebel agent to seek revenge on those in charge. Sci-fi martial arts thriller, based on the animated series, with Charlize Theron, Marton Csokas, Frances McDormand, Jonny Lee Miller and Sophie Okonedo

programme.title: Oldboy
programme.desc: A man is abducted and locked away in a small room for 15 years then suddenly set free, with no explanation for why he was incarcerated. Bewildered and disorientated, he struggles to adapt to his new-found freedom, but vows to find out what has become of his family and who his captors were so he can mete out his own brand of revenge. Thriller, directed by Park Chan-wook, starring Choi Min-sik, Gang Hye-jung and Yu Ji-tae. In Korean

programme.title: Dorian Gray
programme.desc: A naive Victorian man unthinkingly sells his soul for eternal youth, wishing that a portrait of him should age instead. His wish is granted and he is drawn into a life of debauchery by a hedonistic lord, while over the years, the painting becomes increasingly horrific as it reflects his corrupt true nature. Horror, based on Oscar Wildes novel, starring Ben Barnes, Colin Firth and Ben Chaplin

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption. Writer/director Jed Harts thriller, starring Lyndsey Marshal and Declan Adamson

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: An ex-soldier meets a teen fleeing a gang, an encounter which forces them to confront their pasts while navigating present realities. Director Mark OConnors thriller, starring Luke McQuillan, Aidan Gillen and Daniel Fee

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbets drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When best friends and roommates Dreux and Alyssa discover the latters boyfriend has blown their rent money, the duo faces a race against time to avoid eviction. Comedy, starring Keke Palmer and SZA

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed. Horror starring Tanner Stine and Kaylee Kaneshiro

The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbets drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young couple flee the city during a zombie outbreak, only to be involved in a car crash. When the man awakes, his girlfriend is missing, so he bands together with a rugged survivalist to find his partner - but he only has selected memories of what he has been through. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: A family experience strange events in their house and become convinced it is haunted. However, after moving on, they find the dark forces have followed them and when their son mysteriously falls into a coma, they must find a way to get rid of the paranormal entities tormenting them. Horror, starring Patrick Wilson and Rose Byrne

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: A couple previously tormented by paranormal activity discover their nightmares are not over. As more strange events occur, they turn to a group of paranormal investigators for help in uncovering the dark secrets that connect them to the spirit world. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne and Barbara Hershey

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: Due to the pandemic, Parker and her best friend decide to quarantine at the family lake house alone - or so they think. Horror, starring Gideon Adlon, Bethlehem Million and Dylan Spradberry

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomons diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichtons novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: A streetwise cop is enlisted by a top-secret government force dedicated to policing alien visitors to Earth, teaming up with a veteran agent just as a body-swapping extraterrestrial giant insect begins a reign of terror throughout New York City. Sci-fi comedy, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Linda Fiorentino, Rip Torn and Vincent DOnofrio

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Maverick film-maker Carl Denham and his cast and crew board a ship bound for a mysterious island - but when they arrive, a giant gorilla carries off their leading lady, Ann Darrow. As the crew makes its way through the teeming jungle to find her, the director concocts a dangerous scheme to capture the great ape and take it back to New York. Peter Jacksons remake of the fantasy adventure, starring Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody and Andy Serkis, in a dual role as the ships cook and motion-captured creature

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: Daniel and Lacy Barretts relatively peaceful existence is disturbed when strange things begin to happen around their suburban home. As the situation escalates, the couple become convinced they are being tormented by alien visitors, but when they get in touch with an expert in extraterrestrial activity, they realise their ordeal has only just begun. Sci-fi horror, starring Keri Russell, Josh Hamilton and Dakota Goyo.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part 2
programme.desc: A gang of foolhardy teenagers head for idyllic Crystal Lake with all manner of shenanigans in mind. But before they can get up to anything, a grotesque madman begins bumping them off in increasingly grisly fashion. Horror sequel, starring Amy Steel and John Furey and Warrington Gillette

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part III
programme.desc: Disfigured mass-murderer Jason Voorhees returns having survived a brutal attack and embarks on another blood-drenched killing spree around Crystal Lake. Horror sequel, starring Dana Kimmell, Paul Kratka, Tracie Savage, Jeffrey Rogers and Richard Brooker

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut attempts to stay sane while on a troubled mission to Saturns moon, Titan. Director Mikael Hafstroms sci-fi thriller, starring Casey Affleck, Laurence Fishburne, Emily Beecham and David Morrissey

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: King Kong

As the crew makes its way through the teeming jungle to find her, the director concocts a dangerous scheme to capture the great ape and take it back to New York. Peter Jacksons remake of the fantasy adventure, starring Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody and Andy Serkis, in a dual role as the ships cook and motion-captured creature

Sci-fi comedy, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Linda Fiorentino, Rip Torn and Vincent DOnofrio

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: An inexperienced military officer is sent to the front line in a war against an alien invasion, and dies within minutes. However, at the point of death, he is transported back in time to relive his last day again. As he faces the same battle over and over again, the experience he gains turns him into the ultimate warrior. Sci-fi adventure based on Hiroshi Sakurazakas novel All You Need Is Kill, starring Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Agent J investigates the unauthorised landing of a spacecraft and discovers a malevolent alien disguised as a lingerie model is on the verge of destroying humanity. His only hope of stopping her diabolical plot is to restore the memory of his retired partner K - but his former mentor takes more than a little convincing. Sci-fi comedy sequel, directed by Barry Sonnenfeld, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Rosario Dawson, Lara Flynn Boyle, Johnny Knoxville, Rip Torn and Tony Shalhoub

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: On the desert planet Arrakis, freedom fighters Paul and Chani galvanise the Fremen to strike down murderous conspirators against the Atreides dynasty. Sci-fi drama based on Frank Herberts acclaimed novel, starring Timothee Chalamet, Zendaya, Austin Butler and Rebecca Ferguson

programme.title: Videodrome
programme.desc: A sleazy TV producer investigates a violent pirate broadcast that may be a real snuff movie. In the process, he uncovers a sinister plot to turn the public into brainless drones through their televisions. David Cronenbergs surreal horror, starring James Woods, Sonja Smits, Deborah Harry and Peter Dvorsky

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist tests an invisibility serum on himself, but becomes dangerously intoxicated by the power he acquires. He abandons his morals and heads out into the city to take full advantage of his condition. Realising he has been up to no good, concerned colleagues decide to confront him - with terrible consequences. Paul Verhoevens sci-fi thriller, starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens

programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: A disgraced journalist attempts to save her career by turning to investigative podcasting. She soon starts to wonder if a strange artefact is linked to an alien conspiracy, or whether she is losing her mind. Director Matt Veselys thriller, starring Lily Sullivan

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: A woman reluctantly returns to her family home to support her sister after their mothers death, but finds she has vanished without trace. A series of strange events leaves her convinced there is an evil presence haunting the house, and she tries to find out what it is and what it has done with her sister. Horror, starring Caity Lotz and Casper Van Dien

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: A youngster called Chan Lok-kwan accidentally enters the Walled City, discovers the order amidst its chaos, and learns important life lessons along the way. Chinese crime thriller with subtitles, starring Raymond Lam, Louis Koo and Sammo Hung

programme.title: The Line
programme.desc: A university student attempts to live his life without a fear of consequences. Co-writer/director Ethan Bergers drama, starring Alex Wolff, Lewis Pullman and Bo Mitchell

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Jack Ryan foils an assassination attempt by an IRA splinter group, killing one of the terrorists in the process. However, he becomes caught in a lethal game of cat-and-mouse with the dead mans revenge-seeking brother. Thriller based on Tom Clancys novel, starring Harrison Ford, Sean Bean, Samuel L Jackson, Richard Harris and James Earl Jones, reprising his role from earlier Clancy adaptation The Hunt for Red October

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Following his life-or-death missions in The Da Vinci Code, and Angels and Demons, long suffering expert Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the symbologist suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Director Ron Howards conversion of the Dan Brown thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.title: The Last Stop In Yuma County
programme.desc: While stuck at a rural Arizona rest stop, a salesman is thrust into a hostage situation by the arrival of two ruthless bank robbers. Writer/director Francis Galluppis crime thriller, starring Jim Cummings, Faizon Love and Jocelin Donahue

programme.title: Last Seen Alive
programme.desc: Will Spann is driving his soon-to-be ex-wife Lisa to her parents home when she mysteriously disappears without a trace during a stop at a gas station. A frantic Will engages the local police and Lisas parents in a desperate attempt to find her, but as time passes and suspicion falls on him, he must take matters into his own hands, delving into the towns criminal underbelly while running from the authorities in a race against time. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jaimie Alexander

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer is all set to leave the criminal world behind and start a new life abroad. However, his plans are thwarted when he is asked to track down a gangsters drug-addicted daughter and locate a stolen shipment of Ecstasy. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Michael Gambon, Colm Meaney, Kenneth Cranham and Sienna Miller

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowes remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: The Last Stop In Yuma County
programme.desc: While stuck at a rural Arizona rest stop, a salesman is thrust into a hostage situation by the arrival of two ruthless bank robbers. Writer/director Francis Galluppis crime thriller, starring Jim Cummings, Faizon Love and Jocelin Donahue

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: An idealistic undercover cop in 1960s New York is ostracised by his fellow officers for his refusal to take bribes. Sickened by the widespread corruption in the force and the refusal of his superiors to do anything, he sets out to publicly expose the guilty parties, putting his own life on the line in the process. Fact-based drama directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Al Pacino and John Randolph

programme.title: A Place Called Silence
programme.desc: At a girls middle school plagued by bullying, a students tragic death leads to a wave of disappearances. Thriller, starring Eric Wang and Ning Chang. In Mandarin with English subtitles

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Estranged childhood friends Heather and Carla reunite for a cup of tea after not having spoken in many years. At their meeting, Heather presents an unexpected proposition that will change their lives forever. Director Guillem Morales thriller, starring Naomie Harris and Natalie Dormer

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: A rookie cop is partnered with an unhinged and morally dubious local officer in a small island town. programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts reveals the history of Belfast, the UKs most Victorian city. programme.desc: Lisa begins to feel increasingly neglected by Homer and tries to worm her way into his affections by feigning an interest in American football. Amazingly, she soon shows an aptitude for predicting the outcome of games - an ability that sets him off on an amazing but ill-fated run of betting success

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge suffers a nervous breakdown and has to be packed off for a well-earned rest, leaving Lisa and Bart with Patty and Selma, and Homer alone with Maggie

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Halloween presents the Five-0 team with a typically gory crime to solve - that of a nursing student who was kidnapped and cut to pieces while still alive. Initial evidence points to the black market in human organs, suggesting the killer wanted to sell hers to the highest bidder - but the autopsy reveals something much more sinister is afoot

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: I Ka Wa Mamue (In a Time Past)
programme.desc: Dannos search for the members of a terrorist cell leads to a terrifying life-or-death situation when he activates a suicide bomb rigged to explode at the slightest movement or touch. As technicians set to work to free the nervous cop, McGarrett tries to distract his friend and colleague by getting him to talk about the toughest case of his career, flashing back to Dannos days as a detective in New Jersey, when he and his partner Grace were held hostage by mobsters. Scott Caan and Alex OLoughlin star, with Terrence Howard (Iron Man)

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: An armed hit squad lays siege to Robins Nest, with TC being badly injured and Rick fighting for his life

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: While training with Long Beach SWAT, Street discovers a biker club has stolen a cache of armour-piercing bullets and brings 20-Squad into the hunt for the gang before they can pull off a daring and deadly heist. As Hondo struggles with changes at work, Nichelle finds herself at odds with her former colleague Bruce

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mrs Krabappel tires of her lonely life and searches for love in the personal ads, unaware that Bart knows of her plight and sees it as the perfect opportunity to make mischief. Meanwhile, Homer promises to stop swearing if Ned Flanders shaves off his moustache

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart uses a radio transmitter to trick the townsfolk of Springfield into thinking a child has fallen down a disused well. As events get out of hand, he is forced to own up and face the music - but has difficulty making amends. Featuring the guest voice of Sting

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Following bad advice from his friend Todd Packer, Michael invites a stripper and a Benjamin Franklin impersonator to Phylliss wedding shower. Comedy, starring Steve Carell

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Michael causes problems at Phylliss wedding, and she begins to regret giving him so much responsibility

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer joins the power plants softball team, confident his home-made bat will lead them to victory. However, Mr Burns upsets his dreams of glory by hiring Major League Baseball players instead

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Career aptitude tests have an unexpected effect on the Simpson kids, prompting Lisa to fall in with a bad crowd while perennial troublemaker Bart finds a new respect for law and order

programme.title: The Ultimate Romcom Movies
programme.desc: Film fans Clara Amfo, Ellie Taylor and Russell Kane go head to head as they discuss the essential elements that must feature in the ideal romantic comedy

programme.title: Bridget Joness Baby
programme.desc: Bridgets focus on single life and her career is interrupted when she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch - she can only be 50 per cent sure of the identity of her babys father after a pair of one-night stands. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey, Emma Thompson and Sally Phillips

programme.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
programme.desc: American talk show in which British comedian, actor and writer John Oliver presents a satirical look at the biggest news stories, political developments and pop culture events of the previous seven days. The topical series sees the former Daily Show reporter offer his distinct take on a variety of social, political and existential issues facing society

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
programme.desc: Preparations are being made for Larry and Cheryl to renew their marriage vows on their tenth wedding anniversary, but Larrys efforts to impress the rabbi result in some heated arguments. He also considers an offer from his dry cleaner. Guest starring Gina Gershon

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
programme.desc: In an extended episode, Larry anxiously prepares to open on Broadway in a new production of hit show The Producers - but an argument with co-star David Schwimmer jeopardises the proceedings. programme.title: Stargate Universe

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Convinced the family no longer loves him, a dejected Santas Little Helper decides to run away from home, and has the misfortune to be adopted by Mr Burns - who brainwashes him into becoming a vicious attack dog

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer goes to a Country and Western bar after a row with Marge, and vows to make the venues singing waitress a star. As he throws himself into the role of manager, he realises he has to choose between his new career and his loyalty to his family. Featuring the voice of Beverly DAngelo

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: A computer hacker is released from prison after serving six months for crossing the wrong people, only to walk straight into some masked thugs who bundle him into their car. The Five-0 detectives soon track down the vehicle with the help of the mans autistic little brother - but the news is not good, setting them out on a murder investigation. Meanwhile, Mary arrives in Hawaii and discovers her mother is still alive, so McGarrett stages a reunion - but he doesnt bank on his sister bringing along the motor-mouthed OAP shes been caring for. Christine Lahti, Alan Ruck and Shelley Berman guest star

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: A mans body is found burned in a sugar cane field and phone records lead the team to his psychiatrist, the smart and seductive Dr Olivia Victor. McGarrett is convinced the woman is somehow responsible for her patients demise, but she proves more than a match for the determined detective. Meanwhile, Catherine crosses paths with disgraced witness protection agent Chris Channing, who has information that spells danger for Doris

programme.title: Magnum P.I.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: After a prison transport van overturns, Hondo and the team hunt down three female fugitives, including a serial killer on the verge of a rampage. Wth Annies return to work, Deacon struggles to maintain a work-life balance, and Luca does his best to teach Kelly to drive

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.desc: Milhouse falls in love with a new girl at school and begins to spend all his time with her, so, in a bid to get his friend back, Bart decides to tell her strict Catholic father about the relationship

Spurs were managed by Harry Redknapp and had a strong run that led them to the final of the competition, having beaten the likes of Newcastle, Liverpool and Watford in previous rounds. The Red Devils had beaten Middlesbrough, Queens Park Rangers and Blackburn Rovers in the early rounds, before beating Derby County 4-3 on aggregate

programme.desc: Luke Donald shares his memories of the remarkable 2012 Ryder Cup in Medinah, where the European team made a staggering comeback to win on the final day.
